item.title: Hello!
item.description: Welcome to my site! About me My name is Rik and I survived the Y2K, I’m a software engineer from Guatemala, I like to develop games, cycling, build model kits and to eat pizza.
item.content:
Welcome to my site!

About me

My name is Rik and I survived the Y2K, I’m a software engineer from Guatemala, I like to develop games, cycling, build model kits and to eat pizza.
